text: Lucas Agustín Decicilia (born May 11, 1998 in Argentina) is an Argentinian sport shooter. He won the Men's 10m Air Rifle event at 2014 ISSF World Cup, Fort Benning, thus earning a quota to participate in the 2014 Youth Olympic Games. ==Career== == References == == External links == *Lucas Decicilia COARG Profile *Portrait of the athlete, DECICILIA, Lucas - ARG Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Shooters at the 2014 Summer Youth Olympics
title: Lucas Decicilia
